Text: Mohammad (PUHB - Penis Up His Butt) was a child molester, and his followers are bloodthirsty murderers.
songbyrds fils de pute; espece de chatte
This should not come as a surprise... The Christian Bible and the Hebrew Bible run into the same problem.

Yeah. If christianity is wrong then as islam walks the same path, but only harder and more uncompromising it is then horribly wrong.

But the worst problem for me in islam is the blatant, and vicious falsification of history.

Islam seem to claim that all great men of history BEFORE islam were muslims?!?!?! Even Alexander the great! How DARE THEY?

As you search for the true meaning of the Quran, be frightened for its abyss of ignorance. All thinking peoples should think why islamists says that the quran can only be legitimate in arabic! All muslims should ask themselves why an allmighty God only sends and angel to an backwater sandy desert town like Mecca (not literate China?) and an alleged illiterate person like Muhammad, who allways CHANGED his prophecies according to what he himself wanted and the damn book can apparently ONLY be understood in arabic?!?!?! This at the time small, insignificant language of a few slavetraders in the desert.

The more I read the Quran, the more EVIL I find Muhammad! How can peoples believe in this? Can it be that most muslims dont understand arabic?
